isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 3200, 4100, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500, 8600 Models Built After 05/19/2003 - HOOD, GRILLE, FENDERS AND BUMPER - 4100, 4200, 4300, 4400 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - 41/42/43/4400 SERIES BUMPER

svcsubproc.title: Bumper Removal
svcsubproc.para: The 41/42/43/4400 Series aerodynamic bumper is attached to the chassis bumper mounting brackets utilizing (4) four bolts. Beginning at the upper two bolts, loosen bolts. Loosen and remove both lower bumper bolts. Supporting the bumper, remove the two remaining bolts. Remove bumper.

svcsubproc.title: Bumper - Install
svcsubproc.para: Beginning at the upper bolt hole of the steel bumper:

step1.para: Locate the bumper mounting holes with the mounting bracket holes.
Insert bolts in the upper holes, one driver side, one passenger side. Hand tighten.
Locate the lower bumper mounting holes and insert lower bolts, and hand tighten.
Finish tightening the bumper bolts with socket to the torque requirement as designated in the torque chart.
